name: Advance 4137
description:
40s Advance 4137 smock top sewing pattern Bust 32 to 34. 

The pattern is an unmarked COMPLETE pattern and undated. The envelope shows wear with age related discoloration and rips all around edges and back top. *The instructions are very brittle and have been taped all over seams and sides. There are a few gaps of information missing but all of the text instructions are intact. I didn't want to handle them too much to take a picture but if you need one let me know.

I love this pattern and just the front illustration is great. Smock patterns are so versatile and comfortable and this one has pockets and a choice of short or long sleeves.

Size Medium
Bust 32 to 34
Waist 26 1/2 to 28
Hip 35 to 37
Width across back 4 inches below neck 13 1/2 to 14
Length 1 inch hem, 33
Width at lower edge, approx. 60

name: Vogue 2359 Belleville Sassoon evening dress sewing pattern
description:
Vogue 2359 UNCUT American Designer Belleville Sassoon gown pattern, multi-size 12, 14, 16 (see below for measurements).

What a beautiful evening, special event or party dress.

The pattern is UNCUT and in its factory folds and is a multi-size pattern. The pattern makes a misses' close-fitting dress. The dress is lined, A-line in either an above mid-knee or floor length version with a train. It has shoulder straps with the right strap extending into a loop to secure bias, tucked drape, foundation and back zipper. 


Size 12-14-16
Bust 34-36-38
Waist 26 1/2-28-30
Hip 36-38-40

Finished back lengths

A 58 1/4 58 1/2 58 3/4
B 38 38 1/4 38 1/2


UNCUT and factory folded, the envelope has some wrinkles on corners, and a few small rips.

name: Simplicity 7460 dress sewing pattern Bust 36
description:
60s Simplicity 7460 misses' dress in two lengths Bust 36.

The pattern is cut and complete but please note that one pattern piece appears to be handmade and there are some pieces of masking tape on the pieces and some holes but the pieces are still completely usable. The envelope has wrinkles, tears and shows wear.

The pattern makes a very cute 60s mod A-line dress with square front neckline, back zipper and V. 1 and 2 have patch pockets.

Size 14
Bust 36
Waist 27
Hip 38
Back waist length 16 1/2
Finished back length dress V. 1, 3, 40 1/2 
Finished back length Version 2, 36 1/2

Items are mailed the same day when possible!

name: McCall's 3790 sewing pattern for dress and jacket Bust 33
description:
50s McCall's 3790 sewing pattern for dress and jacket Bust 33.


This pattern is cut and complete and dated 1956. The pattern also includes instructions for cutting, sewing and alterations to tailor the fit to your size.

The envelope has rips all around the sides and edgs and age related discoloration on the front with some darker marks.

Bust 33
Waist 25 1/2
Hip 35
Back length neck base to waist 15 1/2
